short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to easily find and connect with influencers on TikTok

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding the right influencers on TikTok can be time-consuming and costly, but with Letz DM, your influencer marketing efforts are streamlined and efficient. Designed for marketers, consumer SaaS, and agencies, Letz DM enables users to find influencers who align with your target audience. From hashtags and keywords to advanced filters, Letz DM provides a powerful set of tools that turns influencer discovery into a matter of seconds.

Whether you’re looking to launch your first campaign or scale up your influencer outreach, Letz DM allows you to connect with relevant influencers, set up outreach campaigns, and get comprehensive reports—all from one Chrome extension.

Core Features

* Discover Influencers by Hashtags & Keywords: Unlock the full potential of TikTok’s dynamic environment by searching influencers using trending hashtags or keywords that resonate with your brand. With Letz DM, you can effortlessly locate creators already engaging with topics that matter to your campaign goals, helping you reach the right audience faster.
* Advanced Filtering Options for Precision Targeting: Fine-tune your influencer search by filtering profiles based on follower counts, likes, and engagement metrics. Whether you’re targeting niche micro-influencers or larger figures, Letz DM’s customizable filters help you identify the right influencers for your specific campaign needs.
* Automated Direct Messaging & Flexible Contact Options: When TikTok allows, Letz DM supports direct messages (DMs) with creators, so you can easily start meaningful conversations without needing manual intervention. In cases where DMs aren’t supported, Letz DM provides email contact options (where available) to ensure you can still reach out seamlessly.
* Accurate Collaboration Cost Estimates: Budget planning is simplified with Letz DM’s collaboration cost estimator, providing a calculated cost range for influencer partnerships based on engagement and follower metrics. Make informed decisions and manage your budget more effectively without unexpected surprises.
* Comprehensive Campaign Reporting: Letz DM provides a complete view of your influencer outreach efforts with detailed campaign reports. Access influencer stats, outreach performance, engagement metrics, and links to influencer profiles—all in one place. With this data at your fingertips, you can evaluate each campaign’s success and refine future marketing strategies with confidence.

Why Letz DM?

With Letz DM, influencer discovery becomes a quick, data-driven process, allowing you to spend more time building impactful campaigns and less time sifting through endless profiles. Our platform is designed to empower marketers and brands to make smarter decisions by removing guesswork, offering accurate influencer insights, and providing an all-in-one solution for influencer marketing on TikTok.

Who Benefits from Letz DM?

Letz DM is ideal for:

* Brand Marketers and Growth Teams seeking to enhance their TikTok presence.
* Agencies & Consultants who want to offer faster, data-backed influencer recommendations to their clients.
* E-Commerce & Consumer Brands committed to creating authentic influencer partnerships that drive sales and engagement.

Flexible Plans for Every Stage of Growth

* Free Trial (No credit card required)
Ideal for testing out Letz DM’s capabilities.
  * 1 campaign
  * Search by hashtags and keywords
  * Filter by followers & likes
  * Access to 25 unique TikTok influencer profiles
* Monthly Plan - $49/month
Designed for growing brands wanting to scale influencer outreach.
  * Includes advanced features such as link in bio, estimated collaboration costs, and detailed campaign reporting.
* Annual Plan - $399/year
For businesses fully committed to influencer marketing, with unlimited campaigns, complete reporting.

Get Started Today with Letz DM!

Start your journey towards effective influencer marketing on TikTok by installing the Letz DM Chrome extension. Let us help you connect with the perfect influencers, maximize your marketing efforts, and achieve your goals faster than ever.

Ready to transform your TikTok strategy?
Install Letz DM today and find out how easy it is to discover the right influencers for your brand.
